entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:21 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
